merquaco.figures.plot_pixel_percentagesÔÉÅ

merquaco.figures.plot_pixel_percentages(transcripts_percent: float, detachment_percent: float, damage_percent: float = nan, ventricle_percent: float = nan, colormap_list: list = ['white', 'orange', 'green', 'red', 'blue'], colormap_labels: list = ['Off-tissue', 'Damage', 'Tissue', 'Lifting', 'Ventricles'], ax: Axes = None, title: str = '', out_file: Union[str, Path] = '', dpi: int = 100)ÔÉÅ

Plots proportion of ‚Äòideal tissue area‚Äô for each classified category

Parameters:

  • transcripts_percent (float) ‚Äì Percent of ideal tissue area classified as transcripts.

  • detachment_percent (float) ‚Äì Percent of ideal tissue area classified as detachment.

  • damage_percent (float, optional) ‚Äì Percent of ideal tissue area classified as damage.

  • ventricle_percent (flot, optional) ‚Äì Percent of ideal tissue area classified as ventricles.

  • colormap_list (list, optional) ‚Äì List of colors for plotting. Default is [‚Äúwhite‚Äù, ‚Äúorange‚Äù, ‚Äúgreen‚Äù, ‚Äúred‚Äù, ‚Äúblue‚Äù].

  • colormap_labels (list, optional) ‚Äì Labels for colormap. Default is [‚ÄúOff-tissue‚Äù, ‚ÄúDamage‚Äù, ‚ÄúTissue‚Äù, ‚ÄúLifting‚Äù, ‚ÄúVentricles‚Äù].

  • ax (plt.Axes, optional) ‚Äì Axes on which to plot. Default is None.

  • title (str, optional) ‚Äì Title for plot. Default is ‚Äò‚Äô.

  • out_file (str or Path, optional) ‚Äì Path at which to save plot. Default is ‚Äò‚Äô.

  • dpi (int, optional) ‚Äì DPI value for plot. Default is 100.

Return type:

None

Raises:

ValueError ‚Äì If only one of [‚Äòdamage_percent‚Äô, ‚Äòventricle_percent‚Äô] are passed.
